rdf:Description.dc:title: Generalized procedure for assessing post-mining groundwater supply potential in the plains of Alberta 1986
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Trudell, Mark R.
Moran, Stephen R.
Alberta. Reclamation Research Technical Advisory Committee.
Alberta. Land Conservation and Reclamation Council.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton?] : Alberta Land Conservation and Reclamation Council, Reclamation Research Technical Advisory Committee,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Part of a series of reports that presents the findings of the Plains Hydrology and Reclamation Project. -- Part of the study: Assessment of reclamation potential and hydrologic impact of large scale surface mining of coal in plains of Alberta
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Reclamation of land
Strip mining
Groundwater
Water-supply, Agricultural
